page.title: 04RECREATION. (BMX bikes).
page.content: {BMX}is short for{British Motor {Cross}and is a new form of bike-riding which requires a{modified bicycle which resembles a miniature trials bike. You require a bike which has the proper{racing handlebars, seat, {pedals, and frame.}If you are going {racing}you need a{helmet, gloves, {padded trousers,}and a{jacket. The{nearest track}to us is {Margrove Park}(654160), there are also tracks at Saltburn and Brotton. The Margrove Park track is for{racing which takes place{every Sunday,}about 15 races according to age. At the industrial estate near our school, a lot of people practice{free-styling. The{cost}of such a bike ranges {from Â£100 to Â£1000.}The more expensive bikes are used for racing as they are lighter and also have stronger frames.
